attributes.action: Tony Blair to Resign as Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the following action to take place as we live in a democratic society and anything else that we vote for or against,our views seem to get ignored. We ask that the reason for this to be abolished being Tony Blair to resign from the role of Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
